example.sent_eng: It stands to reason that if you don't study, you won't pass the exam.

e.eng: if you will excuse the expression

example.sent_eng: The manager was held to account for the team's poor performance.

example.sent_eng: The government must be held to account for its decisions.
example.sent_cat: El govern ha de retre comptes per les seves decisions.

example.sent_eng: His life was on the line.

e.eng: to be roasted over many fires

example.sent_eng: It's the best restaurant in town, bar none.
example.sent_cat: És el millor restaurant de la ciutat, sense cap mena de dubte.

example.sent_eng: He is, bar none, the best player on the team.
example.sent_cat: És, sens dubte, el millor jugador de l'equip.

example.sent_eng: It is, bar none, the best product on the market.
example.sent_cat: És el millor producte del mercat, indiscutiblement.

example.sent_eng: He is the fastest of them all, bar none.
example.sent_cat: És el més ràpid de tots, sense excepció.

example.sent_eng: He didn't pass muster during the final evaluation.
example.sent_cat: No va rebre el vistiplau durant l'avaluació final.

example.sent_eng: The proposal didn't pass muster with the committee.
example.sent_cat: La proposta no va rebre el vistiplau del comitè.

example.sent_eng: She had to pass muster before joining the elite team.
example.sent_cat: Havia de passar revista abans d'unir-se a l'equip d'elit.

example.sent_eng: He's completely under his boss's thumb.
example.sent_cat: Està completament sota el jou del seu cap.

example.sent_eng: She has him under her thumb.
example.sent_cat: El té dins el puny.

example.sent_eng: The dictator kept the country under his thumb for decades.
example.sent_cat: El dictador va mantenir el país sota el jou durant dècades.

example.sent_eng: He sneaked a peek at the answers.
example.sent_cat: Va donar una ullada d'amagat a les respostes.

example.sent_eng: She sneaked a peek at the gift.
example.sent_cat: Va ullar discretament el regal.

example.sent_eng: The kids sneaked a peek at their Christmas presents.
example.sent_cat: Els nens van espiar un moment els seus regals de Nadal.

example.sent_eng: That movie blew my mind!
example.sent_cat: Aquella pel·lícula em va deixar bocabadat!

example.sent_eng: His performance blew my mind!
example.sent_cat: La seva actuació em va fer al·lucinar!

example.sent_eng: The plot twist blew my mind!
example.sent_cat: El gir de guió em va deixar de pedra!

example.sent_eng: This idea blows my mind!
example.sent_cat: Aquesta idea em sorprèn molt!

example.sent_eng: He left me in the lurch when I needed him the most.

example.sent_eng: He left me in the lurch at the last moment.
example.sent_cat: Em va deixar penjat a l'últim moment.

example.sent_eng: They left us in the lurch when they canceled the project.

example.sent_eng: Don't leave me in the lurch now that the difficult moment is coming!
example.sent_cat: No em deixis tirat ara que ve el moment difícil!
